package.name: samba
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xzf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}.tar.gz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/source3 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --localstatedir=/var --with-piddir=/var/run \ --with-pammodulesdir=/lib/security --with-fhs --enable-swat=no --with-pam=no \ --with-cluster-support=no --with-acl-support=no --with-quotas=no --with-sys-quotas=no CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" pump make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --localstatedir=/var --with-piddir=/var/run \ --with-pammodulesdir=/lib/security --with-fhs --enable-swat=no --with-pam=no \ --with-cluster-support=no --with-acl-support=no --with-quotas=no --with-sys-quotas=no make fi
package.install:
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/etc/samba cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/source3 make install DESTDIR=${TGTDIR} install -v -m644 ../examples/smb.conf.default ${TGTDIR}/etc/samba
